LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.Preset.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose your color preset of the theme.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.ProductAttributeId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value:
Choose the color square product attribute which will be shown in the product box.
Note: The attribute should be of type 'color square'!

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.UseSecondaryFont.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this option if you would like to use a secondary font (Droid Serif Italic) on secondary places like titles, header, footer, prices, etc.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.HeaderLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined header layout designs

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.FooterLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose one of the two predefined layout designs for the footer

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.FooterLogo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Upload logo image that will be used in the footer in case of footer layout 2

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.SubCategoriesPlace
LocaleResource.Value: Place subcategories on top of the page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.SubCategoriesPlace.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked subcategories will be placed on top of the page. If is not checked subcategories will be placed in the second column, when the catalog pages are set to have the two column layout

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.CatalogPagesItemBoxesPerRow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose how many products will be displayed on one line on all catalog pages

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.HomePageItemBoxesPerRow
LocaleResource.Value: Number of home page products per row

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.HomePageItemBoxesPerRow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose how many products will be displayed on one line on the home page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.IsCategoryPageOneColumn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to make all catalog pages in One Column.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultCategoryNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce category navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultManufacturerNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce manufacturer navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultVendorNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce vendor navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.ProductThumbsWithPictures.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the product thumbs on Product Details page to be visible with Pictures.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Admin.Settings.RollOverEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable product image roll over functionality on hover.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Newsletter.Description
LocaleResource.Value: Subscribe to our newsletter and get information about our latest offers and prices.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Uptown.Common.GiftCardCouponCode.Tooltip
LocaleResource.Value: If you have a coupon or gift card you can enter the code here
